Answers.MP Summary: print or set the system date and time
Top-3 Similar Questions: ul_502439: How do I set timezone to UTC-8
au_819601: How do you Set Custom Time in Ubuntu?
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_502439: $ TZ='<UTC-8>+8' date
Fri Feb 22 19:25:36 UTC-8 2019

$ TZ='<yesterday>24' date
Fri Feb 22 03:30:15 yesterday 2019
$ TZ='tomorrow-24' date
Sun Feb 24 03:30:26 tomorrow 2019

TZ=UTC-8 date

au_597395: gsettings set org.gnome.settings-daemon.plugins.media-keys custom-keybindings "[<altered_list>]"
